game.name: Scam Line
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Scam Line is a 4–8 player social deception game where your party will face different challenges. Become a liar, a manipulator, a cheater, or find your own path to victory
game.shortDescriptionEn: Scam Line is a 4–8 player social deception game where your party will face different challenges. Become a liar, a manipulator, a cheater, or find your own path to victory
